attributes.action: remove the cancer causing Monosodium Glutamate from out of our food supply.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Monosodium Glutamate is known to increase the chances of developing cancer. Many cancers are related directly to the artificial additives in the foods that we consume, and these additives are not meant to be consumed by the human body. Health should be of greater importance than profit.
